body.name: Superio Heavy Duty Plastic Dustpan with Comfort Grip Handle Beige, Durable, Lightweight Multi Surface Dust Pan Easy Broom Sweeping, 10 inch Wide
body.stockDetail: Only 7 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 24 mins
features: HEAVY DUTY: The dustpan is constructed with durable materials and will last you for years. It is the old-fashioned dustpan that does not bend or warp. It ensures a clean and easy sweep all the time.

LOW EDGE: It is custom-shaped to hug the floor, so dust is not swept under the dustpan. Your home will be kept clean and precious as it lies flat without holding it down. Sweeps fine on ceramic tiles or parquet floors.
PERFECT SIZE: The total width of the dustpan is 10 inches, the height is 1.2 inches, and the handle is 4 inches long for easy grip. Perfect fit for most household brooms.
EFFICIENT CLEANING: This is the number 1 rated dustpan with maximum pickup, good to use with any standard broom, for home, office, indoor or outdoor. It will not leave a dust line after sweeping.
EASY STORAGE: It has a nice round hole to hang it on a hook together with other cleaning tools like brooms or mops so you can keep your home, garage and closets well-organized.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Here at Superio, we strive to constantly innovate new designs, technologies, and materials to create always improving cleaning supplies, household storage supplies, kitchen products, and bath products. We care about making our customer’s lives easier and simpler at home and beyond. Many consumer goods companies look to take shortcuts and eliminate key product features that cost a bit more time to manufacture but make the product superior to the competition and better for customers everywhere. We don’t believe in taking shortcuts or getting rid of features that limit functionality and usefulness. It’s our job to make your life easier so you can spend less time cleaning and organizing and more time enjoying your home and your life. Our product help make your home more comfortable, inviting, and a place to enjoy with your family, friends, and loved ones. Try Superio products today and see the difference for yourself.

Heavy Duty This dustpan is constructed with durable materials and will last for years. It is the old-fashioned dustpan that does not bend or warp. Grip and Easy Storage The handle is 4 inches long for easy grip. It also has a nice round hole to hang it on a hook together with other cleaning tools like Brooms, Mops so you can keep your home, garage and closets well organized. Low Edge It is custom molded to hug the floor, so dust is not swept under the dustpan, your home will be kept clean and precious.
Heavy Duty Dustpan Material: Durable plastic Color: Beige Dimensions: 12 x 2.5 x 10 inches This Dustpans design is to use with any standard broom available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In sterquiliniis invenitur - "In filth it will be found"
reviews.reviewText: With potent trident the primal god Neptune rules over the dim domain of the murky unknown promising treasures and terrors alike - and so too does this prodigious apparatus augment the powers of the palace’s ordained sovereign, serving to execute the master’s intention on even the dark crevices and hidden filth beneath sanctioned, public furnishings.No longer must you wallow in hellish half-sleep disturbed by images of muck and detritus which you know have gathered along avenues of your abode travelled by dribbling beasts, nibbling rodents, and wriggling insects, where no human may venture unless prostrated, bowed low as if in supplication to an ancient, evil eidolon of grime and corruption under which all of mankind is eternally cursed.Fortified with this hallowed weapon, I have constituted the means to dispose of the ordure which has hitherto smirched my vim and gaiety; the house being but one half of a synergistic expression betraying the truth of my psychic situation, I have resolved to answer the quest to expunge pollution without - and in so doing exorcise the wickedness within!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New dust pan
reviews.reviewText: The color is exactly what I was looking for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I use it to sweep up after my cats ant it is perfect for that task!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Nice size, clean one piece. The edge is blunt, can’t sweep fine sand or dust over a blunt edge. The incline behind edge is too wide, leaves little room for sweepings. A $2.00 dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ultra-sticky gooey labels that is virtually impossible to remove
reviews.reviewText: I copied another review. Same issue.Whoever made this dustpan applied one of those ultra-sticky gooey labels that is virtually impossible to remove, and put it EXACTLY where dust and dirt have to go. Tried to get the damn thing off and now it's a 2 x 3 inch patch of sticky goo which attracts and grabs dirt that can't even be brushed or rinsed off. Not a good way to prepare a product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A disappointing product
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed with this dustpan. I got it because my old Rubbermaid dustpans had worn-down edges from years of use. Were those made in the USA? This new one is crap next to them. We all know where it was probably made. It does not collect all the swept-up dust and debris as advertised. No matter how hard I tried, a line of stuff was left on the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as Pictured
reviews.reviewText: I would not recommend this to anyone. The pictures are of a plain dust pan, but when received, it comes with a giant sticker on the front that has a super sticky back. The adhesive does not come off so when used all the dirt just sticks to the pan. It is unusable.
